ShowBaseGlobal.direct.widget.setX(
            ShowBaseGlobal.direct.camera,
            x + 0.5 * dr.mouseDeltaX * dr.nearWidth * (y/dr.near))
        ShowBaseGlobal.direct.widget.setZ(
            ShowBaseGlobal.direct.camera,
            z + 0.5 * dr.mouseDeltaY * dr.nearHeight * (y/dr.near))
